name: Space Towing Service
description:
Controlls:

W -> Thrust forward

S->  Brake

A-> Roll left

D-> Roll right

STRG -> Tow ship at back

Space -> Shoot

Save as many ships to gain Points. The more ships you deliver in 5 seconds the higher the point multiplier gets. You can tow multiple ships in the back.  Get back to Station to refuel and restock on ammo. The green indicator shows the way back to Station. The orange indicator shows the next lost ship!

Dont go to far away from station. The radiation Zone will kill you!
